gridworld.actor

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • gridworld.actor.Actor
      • gridworld.actor.MovableActor
        • gridworld.actor.Ghost
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Casper, Dijkstra, Inky

    public abstract class Ghost
extends MovableActor
    This class sets the base for all common ghost abilities.

    • Method Detail

      • isScared

        public static boolean isScared()
        A Ghost is scared if its scared timer timer is greater than 0.
        Returns:
        True if scared, false if not.

      • scare

        public static void scare()
        Scares the Ghost, restarts its scared timer/

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(Location newLocation)
        Moves the Ghost to the the new Location by 1) deleting this Ghost 2) If the new Location hold no Actor, creates a new Ghost there 2) If there is a pellet in the new Location, deletes the pellet and puts a pellet in this location 3) Put a new Ghost in the new Location
        Specified by:
        moveTo in class MovableActor
        Parameters:
        newLocation - the new location

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove(Location next)
        A Ghost can move anywhere except if the next location has a wall or another Ghost. A Ghost cannot move backwards.
        Parameters:
        next - The next Location
        Returns:
        True if can move, false otherwise.

      • visualizePath

        protected void visualizePath(java.util.ArrayList<Point> path,
                             BoundedGrid grid)
        Helper Method to visualize the path of a Ghost. Turns the pellets into the color of the Ghost.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the Ghost, in points.

      • clearPath

        protected void clearPath(java.util.ArrayList<Point> path)
        Created to protect existing calls
        Parameters:
        path - Path of points

      • clearPath

        protected void clearPath(java.util.ArrayList<Point> path,
                         BoundedGrid grid)
        Helper Method to clear the path of a Ghost when it is disrupted (like when pacman hides). Turns the pellets back to white.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the Ghost, in points.

      • visualizePath

        Parameters:
